Name: Stuffed Petals
Description: Tulip petals stuffed with goat cheese and herbs.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Tulip petals stuffed with goat cheese and herbs.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 염소 치즈와 허브로 가득 찬 튤립 꽃잎 스터프트.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Tulpenblüten gefüllt mit Ziegenkäse und Kräutern.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Tulipán szirmok kecskesajttal, és fűszerekkel töltve.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ヤギのチーズとハーブをチューリップの花びらに詰めた料理。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Pétalas recheadas com queijo de cabra e ervas.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Лепестки тюльпана, фаршированные козьим сыром и зеленью.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 香草乳酪。填充了薰衣草和郁金香的山羊奶酪。
